task.title: Adding a throw action for a custom error message
task.shortdesc: A throw action throws a custom error. This action ends the current assembly rule.

context.p: You can customize an error in the throw action. When the throw action is triggered, a custom error is thrown. After the throw action is triggered, the does not run the subsequent assembly actions and the current assembly rule is ended. The thrown error, which includes an error identifier and text for the error message, is saved in the API context.

step.cmd: From the search results, select Assembly Throw Action.
Specify the text for the error message.
